commonPoints.head: PART-A :  EMD  & Cost of documents :
commonPoints.content: We are exempted  from paying EMD &Cost of documents  being an MSME Registered company and attached herewith the MSME  UDYOG AADHAAR MEMOROANDUM UAN NO TS20A0007730. AND NSIC for your kind consideration

commonPoints.head: PART -B : TECHNO COMMERCIAL BID:
commonPoints.content: We attach here with  the following doc-Performance certificates, P. O’s. Agreement, Inspection Reports, Delivery Challans Etc.

commonPoints.head: PART – C :PRICE BID  :
commonPoints.content: The prices are mentioned in bid, Our Prices are Firm and free at destination stores by inland road transport as per Tender Specification.

commonPoints.head: TAXES AND DUTIES :
commonPoints.content: At present as per Goods and Services Tax Act, 2016, GST applicable for Transformers is 18%(IGST).

commonPoints.head: DELIVARY :
commonPoints.content: We agree to your delivery terms as per Schedule of Requirements.

commonPoints.head: PAYMENT :
commonPoints.content: We agree to your terms of Payment.

commonPoints.head: PERFORMANCE SECURITY :
commonPoints.content: We agree to your Performance Security Clause.

commonPoints.head: WARRANT :
commonPoints.content: We agree to your warrant clause.

commonPoints.head: VALIDATY :
commonPoints.content: Our offer is valid for a period of 180 days from the date of online bid
